name: Baklava
public_notice:
The following token has a variable tax function on the smart contract - which allows contract owners to change tax rates post deployment.
Do your own research and be careful if you are trading this token.
additional_notices: Kindly be aware of liquidity-related risks. This notice is not directed at any project in particular, and is more of a cautionary reminder.

description.en:
Baklava Space is designed as a combination of automated yield farming for your LP tokens and a synthetic creation mechanism using LP tokens. 

In Baklava Space, users keep 100% their original LP tokens and at the same time, Baklava is optimising the yield from user's LP token by actively auto-compounding the LP with lowest possible cost (all APY shown have already included fees), earning $BAVA rewards, and (soon) earning synthetic asset profits.
